title: You're ready to ship!
subtitle: What would you like to do first?

registrationSource.regSource: How did you hear about us?

storeConnection.title: Connect your store to automatically import your orders
storeConnection.subtitle: Which store would you like to connect?
storeConnection.nextStep: I do not use any of these

additionalInformation.title: Tell us more about your business
additionalInformation.subtitle: Let's set up your account
additionalInformation.address: Where will you be shipping from?
additionalInformation.proPlanTrialMessage: You’re starting a free trial of Shippo’s Professional Plan (up to {{labelCount}} labels per month). Let’s set up your account.
additionalInformation.whatTypeOfBusiness: How do you plan to use Shippo?
additionalInformation.shippoUseCase: Which best describes your business needs?

instructionalMessages.title: You can still create labels manually or by importing a CSV file with all your order information
instructionalMessages.primaryStore: What e-commerce platform do you use?
instructionalMessages.connectEbayCanadaPost: Your orders have successfully synced from eBay Canada. To ship within Canada, connect to a Canada Post account now.

welcomeMessage.title: Welcome {{name}}!
welcomeMessage.text: We help you manage all your shipping needs, so you can focus on growing your business.
welcomeMessage.godaddyTitle: <0>Shippo provides discounted shipping labels to GoDaddy users.</0><1>We have created a Shippo account for you and connected it to your GoDaddy store. A temporary Shippo password has been sent to <1>{{email}}</1>.</1>

progressIndicator.business: Tell us more about your business

eBayCA.message1: Your Shippo and eBay.ca accounts have successfully been linked. All of your orders from eBay.ca will now be accessible on the Orders page.
eBayCA.message2: To access shipping rates and print labels, please connect a carrier now.
eBayCA.message3: Connect a carrier account to see shipping rates and purchase labels.

newOnboarding.connectedStore: Complete set up to see your {{store}} orders in Shippo and access discounts on labels
newOnboarding.labelInputLabel: Save your preferred label size for printing.

preferences.createLabel: To create a shipping label, you'll need:
preferences.hintPartOne: Package dimensions are required in order to generate rates and ship with Shippo. Save package dimensions to reuse on orders that use the same packaging.
preferences.hintPartTwo: You can save dimensions for as many packages as you need.
preferences.hintPartThree: Setting a {{packageDefault}} will save you time by automatically applying the dimensions to all of your packages (this can always be changed if needed).
preferences.carrierCopy: Shippo connects you to carriers so you can get started right away. If you’d also like to use your own carrier account, add it below.
preferences.usCopy: With Shippo, you get discounted rates with USPS, UPS, and DHL Express so you can get started right away.
preferences.canadaCopy: With Shippo, you get discounted rates with Canada Post so you can get started right away.
preferences.ausCopy: With Shippo, you get discounted rates with Sendle, Fastway, and CouriersPlease so you can get started right away.
preferences.germanyCopy: With Shippo, you get discounted rates with Deutsche Post so you can get started right away.
preferences.addOwnCarrierCopy: However, if you’d also like to use your own carrier account, add it below.
preferences.nonMasterCarrierCopy: Because you’re shipping from {{country}}, you will need to connect your own carrier account(s) in order to see rates for shipping labels and ship with Shippo.
preferences.carrierNotice: You must add a carrier account to access rates on Shippo when your sender address is in {{country}}. Sender address not in {{country}}?
preferences.insuranceLabel: Automatically add insurance to all packages
preferences.insuranceDesc: Package Protection insures your packages with low rates and an easy claims process. Insurance is administered by Shipsurance. Exclusions apply.
preferences.insuranceDescVariant: Shippo Total Protection insures your packages with low rates and an easy claims process.
preferences.insuranceDescVariantTwo: By purchasing protection, you agree to the <1>policy terms, conditions, and exclusions</1>.  Protection powered by Cover Genius.

packagedimensions.label: Do you have some frequently used packaging? Add the dimensions now so you can reuse package details on your orders. Packages can be boxes, bubble mailers, etc.

orders.ordersMechanismTitle: How would you like to add orders to Shippo?
orders.storeSelectionInfo: Connect your store platform to sync orders into Shippo.
orders.requiredAddress: To see rates for shipping labels, we’ll need your sender address. The address you provide will appear on your labels.
orders.syncAddress: Shippo will automatically sync your sender address from {{store}} after you connect.
orders.syncAddressNext: Next, we’ll walk you through connecting to your {{store}} store.
orders.connectInfo: Next, we’ll walk you through connecting to your {{store}} store.

connectAmazon.actionInfo: Next, click <0>Connect Store</0> below to sign in to {{store}} and connect your orders to Shippo.

connectEtsy.actionInfo: Next, click <0>Connect Store</0> below to sign in to {{store}} and connect your orders to Shippo.

connectShopify.actionInfo: Provide your {{store}} URL and click <0>Connect Store</0> below to sign in to your account and sync your {{store}} orders into Shippo.

connectWix.actionInfo: Next, click <0>Connect Store</0> below to sign in to {{store}} and connect your orders to Shippo.

orders.hint: Use more than one store platform? You can always connect to more stores later.

onboardingInfo.title: Tell us about you and your needs
onboardingInfo.radioGroupTitle: How do you plan to use Shippo?
onboardingInfo.companyNamePlaceholder: This will appear on your shipping labels
onboardingInfo.monthlyVolumePlaceholder: This helps us personalize your experience
onboardingInfo.labelInputLabel: Save your preferred label size for printing.
onboardingInfo.businessNeedsLabel: Which best describes your business needs
onboardingInfo.hint: This helps us cater the next steps to your specific needs.

partners.welcomeOpener: To get started, take a look at our API documentation, or explore Shippo’s webapp first.

api.apiPageTitle: Get started with the Shippo API
api.welcomeOpener: Our API is an easy-to-use, customizable API that you can depend on to offer shipping to partners, merchants, and more. Check out our documentation for more details.
api.chatLink: Schedule a time to chat with our team
api.hint: This helps us cater the next steps to your specific needs.
api.formPlaceholder: Or, give us a bit more information on how we can help and our team will get back to you in under 48 hours.

ordersModal.manualConnectionContent: <0>Click <1>Create Label</1> below to create your first shipping label.</0>
ordersModal.storeConnectionContent: Welcome to Shippo, {{name}}! We’ve connected your {{store}} store.
ordersModal.csvConnectionContent: <0>Click <1>Upload CSV</1> below to upload your CSV file.</0>
ordersModal.orSkipThisPart: Or, you can skip this step for now if you’d rather explore Shippo first.
ordersModal.getStartedContent: Click Get Started below to view your orders, buy labels, and get shippin’.
ordersModal.loadingMessage: Welcome to Shippo, {{name}}! We’re connecting to your {{store}} store – it’ll just be a few more moments...
ordersModal.ordersAddErrorMessage: There was an error connecting to your store but your Shippo account has been successfully created. Try connecting to your store again.
ordersModal.recommendDesktop1: <0>We recommend that you switch over to your <1>desktop computer or laptop</1> now to take full advantage of Shippo’s features.</0>
ordersModal.reccomendDesktopOptOut: <0>If you prefer to use mobile, <1>click here</1> to continue</0>
ordersModal.mobileManualLabelTagline: <0>To get started, create your first shipping label.</0>
ordersModal.mobileManualLabelNotice: <0>Shippo is optimized for desktop. But, if you prefer to explore Shippo on mobile,</0> <1>click here</1><2>.</2>

planFeatures.noPerLabelFee: No per-label fee on personal carrier accounts
planFeatures.centsOnLabel: 5¢ per label on personal carrier accounts

newOnboarding.apiError: Oops! We were not able to save your information. Please try again.
newOnboarding.godaddyNotice: We have created a Shippo account for you and connected it to you GoDaddy store. A temporary password has been sent to {{email}}.
